title: Prime Minister of France - Wikipedia
snippet: If so, the president may serve as both the head of state and de facto head of government, while the prime minister serves as his deputy, acting as a link between the legislature and the executive. The current prime minister of France is Sébastien Lecornu who was appointed on 9 September 2025 ...

title: Welcome to the website of the French Presidency
snippet: Find out all the news of the President Emmanuel Macron on the official website and discover our pages on the history of the French Republic.

title: France appoints new government under PM Lecornu
snippet: The lineup, a mix of old and new faces, is Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu's second attempt at bringing together a team to overcome months of deadlock and pass a much-needed austerity budget through a deeply divided parliament.

title: France’s prime minister faces crunch vote in parliament | Politics News | Al Jazeera
